flags.name: polygon-coordinates
flags.validation: Must be valid JSON array of [longitude, latitude] pairs.

flags.description: Explicit notification message for restriction violations
flags.name: notification-message

permissions: Admins can update geofences. Non-admin users can update geofences only for brokers they are members of.
validation_notes: At least one attribute flag must be provided. Polygon coordinates must be a JSON array of [longitude, latitude] pairs; coordinates must be numeric, longitude between -180 and 180, latitude between -90 and 90, contain at least 4 points, and be closed (first and last points identical). Name must be unique within a broker when provided. Status must be one of: active, inactive. Restriction mode must be one of: all_truckers, custom_truckers.
